scripts.say: Smells so good~
Wow...the source of this aromatic smell is coming from the Dragon Empery. Ehhh... let me hide first, I will give them a surprise! Hehehe~
It's finally the day for sister Yat Sen to unseal her secret osmanthus wine! Oh wow... this aroma is really hypnotizing~
Haha, if you don't make mooncakes good enough to match my wine, you won't get a single sip!
I see! Ning Hai is ready to cook!
Sister is being more dedicated than me, for the first time...
Even though there're only three of us, the festivities are still as happy as before...
...Sorry, I've lost my train of thought... but as long as we're still here, one day sooner or later, everyone will gather here together again.
Yes... the Mid-Autumn Festival is one that celebrates a reunion with friends and family.
Say, isn't the Mid-Autumn Festival all about eating mooncakes?
….celebrating a reunion…?
Who's there!
Look who it is. A lady not lady-like at all.
I am a lady --- at the very least, a little bit!
But... this is definitely very humiliating for me, since I’ve been discovered before I can pull my prank!
“Prank”, this kind of word is not supposed to be said by a lady.

I understand! So it seems that the Mid-Autumn Festival is one that “celebrates the reunion with friends and family”, but…how come it seems like such a downer right now? Where I'm from, all festivals should be very lively!
Words can be hurtful... even if they tell the truth.
Whoaaa——Sister Yat Sen, you're joking, right?!
~Stares~
S-Sorry! Th-the second sister made me a bit scared when she appeared!
After all, it's not like Christmas, the Mid-Autumn Festival is not as popular around the world yet.
Although, I feel like Mid-Autumn Festival is better than Christmas -- food-wise!
Is it popular around the world...I get it now! Anyone can celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival, right?!
Umm….yes you're right, but----
Well then, wait for me a bit. This damper of an atmosphere is no festival at all, a festival should be livelier!
She just comes and goes like a puff of smoke...Eagle Union carriers are amazing!
That little troublemaker, she may be pretty cute after all...
